| Release released = runtime = 150 minutes country = India language = Malayalam
| budget = 3 crores
}} 'Cycle' is a 2008 Malayalam film directed by Johny Antony and written by
James Albert, starring Vineeth Sreenivasan, Vinu Mohan, Sandhya, Bhama, and
Jagathy Sreekumar. The tale is about two friends, Roy (Vineeth Sreenivasan) and
Sanju (Vinu Mohan), struggling to make both ends meet with their low salaries,
working respectively as a cashier in a private finance company and as a salesman
in an electronics goods shop. It was a box office success.
